attributes.action: call for the suspension of all MP's accused of making fraudulent expense claims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With many detailed revelations being highlighted in the press concerning fraudulent claims of expenses by MP's the Prime Minister should show leadership and insist that all MP's accused of making fraudulent claims should stand down immediately until proper investigations can be instigated with a view to prosecutions.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
